name: Arch Resources, Inc.
description: Arch Resources, Inc. is a leading coal producer in the United States, focused on the development of high-quality metallurgical and thermal coal. Established in 1969, the company has evolved into a premier supplier of coal to both domestic and international markets. With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, Arch Resources operates a portfolio of mines located primarily in the Appalachian region, which are equipped with advanced technology to ensure environmentally responsible mining practices. The company's metallurgical coal is utilized in steelmaking processes, while its thermal coal is used for electricity generation. Arch Resources is dedicated to reducing its carbon footprint and enhancing operational efficiency through strategic investments in cleaner technologies and practices. The company’s mission is to continue to serve the energy and steel markets while navigating the transition towards cleaner energy solutions, aiming to sustain its role in the energy landscape. Arch Resources also actively engages with communities to promote economic development and environmental stewardship, focusing on building long-term relationships that benefit both the company and the regions in which it operates.
